backend/main.mo: Primary canister logic defining task, category, status, and assignee/captain data structures with access‑controlled CRUD for assignee–captain pairs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration utility converting old actor state to the new format by adding an empty assignee–captain directory.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new UI and API work to specific frontend files and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and design‑token definitions providing a custom OKLCH color system for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app managing authentication, profile setup, admin detection, and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Login‑prompt screen shown to unauthenticated users using Internet Identity.
Modal form for admins to create tasks, handling validation, category/subcategory selection, and auto-filling assignee/captain from a directory.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDirector: Interface to add, edit, and delete assignee–captain pairs, displaying them in a table with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/BulkUploadSectio: Handles CSV/Excel file upload, parses task rows, validates headers, and triggers bulk task creation.
frontend/src/components/CategoryManageme: UI for creating and listing task categories, subcategories, statuses, and payment statuses.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying a copyright message and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing branding, theme toggle, and a user dropdown with profile info and logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter name and email, saving the profile before allowing app use.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailDialog: Displays a dialog showing a table of tasks with loading states and admin edit actions.
frontend/src/components/TaskFormDialog.t: Form dialog for creating or editing tasks, handling field population, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for tasks, user profiles, admin checks, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables for light/dark modes and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for bulk upload, category settings, and assignee directory management.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing task statistics with charts and interactive filters that open a task detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Tasks list page with search, filtering, task creation/editing, and deletion features for admins and users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining current features, requirements, and pending requests related to task assignment without user accounts.
